short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Experience the cosmos with stunning galaxy wallpapers on your new tab.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Ready to dive into the depths of the cosmos? Galaxy Theme transforms your browser with breathtaking galaxy wallpapers, bringing the beauty of stars and planets to every new tab. 

Designed to enhance your browsing experience, this theme combines stunning visuals with powerful features.

Galaxy Theme offers a fully personalized experience. With shortcuts, you can quickly access your most-used apps and websites. The time and date display keeps you on track and helps you stay organized throughout the day. 

You can save your favorite sites with bookmarks and access them with a single click. Additionally, the notes feature lets you jot down quick reminders or ideas, keeping everything in order.

For an even more dynamic experience, the theme switching feature allows you to switch between different galaxy backgrounds. 

Whether you're embarking on a space journey or exploring a new galaxy, each tab offers a fresh and captivating visual experience. This feature lets you customize your browserâ€™s look based on your mood or preference.

Galaxy Theme not only brings the magic of the cosmos but also equips you with tools to boost productivity. Each new tab will feel like an exciting exploration of the universe. Install it now and start your galactic journey in style!
